forecast-period.text: A broad low pressure trough lies through inland parts of the Gascoyne and North Interior.

Wind gusts can be 40 percent stronger than the averages given here, and maximum waves may be up to twice the height. Wind warnings are issued for today and tomorrow and describe the highest category of wind warning for that day.

area.description: North Kimberley Coast: WA-NT Border to Kuri Bay

forecast-period.text: Winds: Southwesterly 10 to 15 knots decreasing to about 10 knots in the evening. Seas: Below 1 metre. Swell: Below 0.5 metres. Weather: Partly cloudy. 20% chance of a shower east of Kalumburu, near zero chance elsewhere. The chance of a thunderstorm.

Winds: Southwesterly 10 to 15 knots becoming variable about 10 knots in the morning. Seas: Below 1 metre. Swell: Below 0.5 metres. Weather: Partly cloudy. 50% chance of showers. The chance of a thunderstorm.
Winds: Variable about 10 knots. Seas: Below 1 metre. Swell: Below 0.5 metres. Weather: Partly cloudy. 60% chance of showers west of Kalumburu, 30% chance elsewhere. The chance of a thunderstorm.
Winds: Variable about 10 knots. Seas: Below 1 metre. Swell: Below 0.5 metres. Weather: Mostly sunny. 30% chance of a shower. The chance of a thunderstorm.

area.description: West Kimberley Coast: Kuri Bay to Wallal

forecast-period.text: Winds: West to southwesterly 10 to 15 knots. Seas: Below 1 metre, increasing to 1 to 1.5 metres south of Broome. Swell: Below 0.5 metres. Weather: Mostly clear. The chance of a thunderstorm inshore early this evening.
Winds: West to southwesterly 10 to 15 knots. Seas: Around 1 metre. Swell: Below 0.5 metres. Weather: Mostly sunny. The chance of a thunderstorm north of Cape Leveque.

Winds: West to southwesterly 10 to 15 knots decreasing to about 10 knots early in the morning. Seas: Around 1 metre, decreasing below 1 metre during the morning. Swell: Below 0.5 metres. Weather: Mostly sunny. 40% chance of showers north of Cape Leveque, near zero chance elsewhere. The chance of a thunderstorm.

Winds: Northwest to southwesterly 10 to 15 knots becoming variable about 10 knots during the morning. Seas: Below 1 metre. Swell: Below 0.5 metres. Weather: Partly cloudy. 20% chance of a shower. The chance of a thunderstorm.

area.description: Pilbara Coast East: Wallal to Cape Preston

forecast-period.text: Winds: Westerly 15 to 20 knots. Seas: 1 to 1.5 metres. Swell: Westerly below 1 metre. Weather: Clear.

Winds: Westerly 15 to 20 knots. Seas: 1 to 1.5 metres, decreasing to 1 metre during the morning, increasing to 1 to 1.5 metres west of Port Hedland around midday. Swell: Below 0.5 metres. Weather: Mostly sunny.

Winds: West to southwesterly 15 to 20 knots. Seas: 1 to 1.5 metres, decreasing to 1 metre during the morning, then increasing to 1 to 2 metres during the afternoon. Swell: Below 0.5 metres. Weather: Mostly sunny.
Winds: Northwest to southwesterly 15 to 20 knots. Seas: 1 to 2 metres, decreasing to 1 to 1.5 metres during the morning. Swell: Westerly below 1 metre. Weather: Mostly sunny.

area.description: Pilbara Coast West: Cape Preston to North West Cape

forecast-period.text: Winds: West to southwesterly 10 to 15 knots, reaching up to 20 knots east of Onslow in the evening. Seas: Around 1 metre, increasing to 1 to 1.5 metres east of Barrow Island. Swell: West to southwesterly below 1 metre, increasing to 1 to 1.5 metres about offshore western waters. Weather: Clear.

Winds: West to southwesterly 15 to 20 knots. Seas: 1 to 1.5 metres, decreasing below 1 metre during the morning, then increasing to 1 to 1.5 metres during the afternoon. Swell: West to southwesterly below 1 metre, increasing to 1 to 1.5 metres about offshore western waters. Weather: Partly cloudy. 20% chance of a shower in Exmouth Gulf in the evening. Near zero chance of rain elsewhere.

Winds: Southwesterly 15 to 20 knots. Seas: 1 to 1.5 metres, decreasing to 1 metre during the morning, increasing to 1.5 metres east of Barrow Island during the afternoon. Swell: West to southwesterly below 1 metre, increasing to 1 to 1.5 metres about offshore western waters. Weather: Partly cloudy. 30% chance of a shower west of Onslow in the morning. Near zero chance of rain elsewhere. The chance of a thunderstorm in the morning.

Winds: South to southwesterly 15 to 20 knots. Seas: Around 1 metre, increasing to 1 to 1.5 metres offshore east of Barrow Island. Swell: West to southwesterly below 1 metre, increasing to 1 to 1.5 metres offshore west of Barrow Island during the afternoon. Weather: Partly cloudy.

area.description: Ningaloo Coast: North West Cape to Cape Cuvier

forecast-period.text: Winds: Southwesterly 10 to 15 knots. Seas: Around 1 metre. Swell: Southwesterly 1 to 1.5 metres, increasing to 2 metres offshore. Weather: Partly cloudy. 20% chance of a shower offshore south of Coral Bay, near zero chance elsewhere.

Winds: South to southwesterly 10 to 15 knots, reaching up to 20 knots inshore in the evening. Seas: Around 1 metre, increasing to 1 to 1.5 metres inshore during the afternoon. Swell: Southwesterly 1 to 1.5 metres, increasing to 1.5 to 2 metres offshore. Weather: Partly cloudy. 40% chance of showers.

Winds: Southwesterly 10 to 15 knots. Seas: Around 1 metre. Swell: Southwesterly 1 to 1.5 metres, increasing to 1.5 to 2 metres offshore. Weather: Partly cloudy. 40% chance of showers in the morning. The chance of a thunderstorm in the morning.
Winds: South to southwesterly 10 to 15 knots. Seas: Below 1 metre. Swell: Southwesterly 1.5 metres, increasing to 1.5 to 2.5 metres during the morning. Weather: Partly cloudy.

area.description: Gascoyne Coast: Cape Cuvier to Kalbarri

forecast-period.text: Winds: Southwesterly 10 to 15 knots. Seas: Around 1 metre, increasing to 1 to 1.5 metres offshore south of Denham. Swell: Southerly 2 to 2.5 metres. Weather: Partly cloudy. 20% chance of a shower.
Winds: South to southwesterly 10 to 15 knots. Seas: Around 1 metre. Swell: South to southwesterly 1.5 to 2.5 metres. Weather: Partly cloudy. 40% chance of showers.

Winds: South to southwesterly 15 to 20 knots. Seas: Below 1 metre, increasing to 1 to 1.5 metres offshore around midday. Swell: Southerly 1 to 1.5 metres, increasing to 1.5 to 2 metres offshore. Weather: Partly cloudy. 40% chance of showers. The chance of a thunderstorm south of Denham in the afternoon.

Winds: South to southeasterly 15 to 20 knots. Seas: 1 to 1.5 metres, increasing to 1 to 2 metres during the afternoon or evening. Swell: South to southwesterly 2 to 3 metres. Weather: Partly cloudy. 20% chance of a shower.
